BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.
SignIn.title: Sign in
SignIn.description: Sign in with Google to access BKquiz. If you don't have an account, the system will automatically create a new account on your first login.
SignIn.terms_text: By signing in, you agree to

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
SignUp.title: Sign up
SignUp.description: Sign up for BKquiz with Google. The system will automatically create a new account when you log in for the first time.
SignUp.terms_text: By signing up, you agree to

Dashboard.alternative_message: Need advanced features? Multi-tenancy & Teams, Roles & Permissions, Shadcn UI, End-to-End Typesafety with oRPC, Stripe Payment, Light / Dark mode. Try <url></url>.

teacher.header_description: Overview and quick access to your resources.
teacher.classes_description: Number of classes you are managing.
teacher.recent_classes_description: Classes you are managing. Click to view details.

student.header_description: View classes you joined and track ongoing sessions.
student.classes_description: Number of classes you are joining.
student.my_classes_description: Classes you are joining. Click to view details.
student.getting_started_step3: Join session and take quiz as instructed by teacher.
student.getting_started_step4: View results and scores after submission.

Quizzes.title: Quizzes
Quizzes.description: Manage your quizzes. Quizzes can be used for multiple classes.
Quizzes.quiz_list_description: Each quiz corresponds to a rules configuration and session.
Quizzes.create_quiz_draft_hint: Create a quiz draft above to get started.

QuestionBank.title: Question Bank
QuestionBank.description: Manage question pools and quickly import questions from Markdown/ZIP.
QuestionBank.drag_drop_or_click: Drag and drop file here or click to select
QuestionBank.get_started_hint: Get started by importing from Markdown/ZIP or creating a new pool.

Classes.create_or_join_hint_teacher: Create a new class or join a class using the class code above.
Classes.create_or_join_hint_student: Join a class using the class code above.

Attempt.can_review_questions_hint: You can review the questions. Time will start counting when the teacher starts the session.
Attempt.session_not_ended: Session has not ended. Please wait for the session to end.
Attempt.review_window_closed: Review window has closed. The time to review detailed answers has ended.
Attempt.review_window_countdown: ⏳ {minutes} minutes left to review detailed answers. The window will close after that.
Attempt.review_not_allowed: Teacher does not allow reviewing detailed answers.
Attempt.question: Question
Attempt.autosave_enabled: Autosave enabled: saves locally immediately, syncs when online.
Attempt.no_questions_in_session: No questions in session (need to configure quiz rules + Start session to snapshot).
Attempt.offline_please_online: You are offline. Please go online to verify token.
Attempt.locked_due_to_failures: You are locked due to too many failed attempts.
Attempt.unanswered_warning: You still have {count} unanswered questions. Are you sure you want to submit?
Attempt.time_up_auto_submit: ⏰ Time is up! Your attempt will be automatically submitted.
Attempt.submit_hint: Only submit when online, no pending sync, and not blocked by checkpoint.
